metadata.title: CVE-2024-26610 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: iwlwifi: fix a memory corruptioniwl_fw_ini_trigger_tlv::data is a pointer to a __le32, which means thatif we copy to iwl_fw_ini_trigger_tlv::data + offset while offset is inbytes, we'll write past the buffer.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
